messages.subject: Winter Issue of Connections now available
messages.msgSnippet: Holiday Greetings! The Winter issue of *Connections--ezine of unschooling and mindful parenting* is now live at http://connections.organiclearning.org We have
messages.messageBody:
Holiday Greetings!

The Winter issue of *Connections--ezine of unschooling and mindful
parenting* is now live at http://connections.organiclearning.org

We have a great line-up this month, with two feature articles on
unschoolers' experiences at the Vermont Not Back to School Camp, one
mom's bittersweet reflections on sending her last child to Driver's Ed,
a dad's excitement and enthusiasm for continuing is unschooling
connections throughout the year, and several other inspirational
articles written by unschoolers themselves.

Enjoy!

--
~~Danielle
Emily (9), Julia (7), Sam (6)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

Connections: ezine of unschooling and mindful parenting
http://connections.organiclearning.org
